Class Competition

java.lang.Object
Competition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LuckyNumbersCompetition, RandomPickCompetition
public class Competition extends Object implements Serializable
Class represents a single Competition. Derived classes for each particular competition type.
Author:
Name: Damian Curran, Student ID: 1331249

  • Constructor Details

    • Competition

      public Competition(String n, int id, boolean tmode)
      Constructor of the Competitions class.
      Parameters:
      n - The name of new Competition object, a String.
      id - The id of the new object, int.
      tmode - Testing mode boolean, true if the object is created whilst in 'Testing mode'.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Get Competition id.
      Returns:
      Returns id integer.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get Competition name.
      Returns:
      Returns name String.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Get Competition type. Overriden in derived classes.
      Returns:
      Returns derived competition type as String.

    • getNoEntries

      public int getNoEntries()
      Get number of entries in the competition.
      Returns:
      Returns number int.

    • getNoWinningEntries

      public int getNoWinningEntries()
      Get number of winning entries in the competition. Winning entries are any entries with a non-zero prize.
      Returns:
      Returns number of winning entries int.

    • getEntryFromIndex

      public Entry getEntryFromIndex(int index)
      Get specific entry in the competition based on index id (entry 1 = index 0).
      Returns:
      Returns Entry object.

    • getEntryFromID

      public Entry getEntryFromID(int entryId)
      Get specific entry in the competition based on entryId.
      Returns:
      Returns Entry object.

    • getTotalPrizes

      public int getTotalPrizes()
      Get to sum of prizes from all entries in the competition.
      Returns:
      Returns sum of prizes int.

    • getActive

      public boolean getActive()
      Identify if competition is active.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean, true if active.

    • getActiveString

      public String getActiveString()
      Identify if competition is active.
      Returns:
      Returns String, "yes" if active, "no" otherwise.

    • getIsTestingMode

      public boolean getIsTestingMode()
      Identify if competition operates in testing mode.
      Returns:
      Returns boolean, true if in testing mode.

    • hasEntries

      public boolean hasEntries()
      Identify if competition has any entries
      Returns:
      Returns boolean, true if entry count is greater than 0.

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean b)
      Sets the active status of the competition.
      Parameters:
      b - Boolean for active status, true is active.

    • addEntry

      public void addEntry(Entry e)
      Add entry to the competition.
      Parameters:
      e - Entry object to add.

    • addEntries

      public void addEntries(Bill b, String memberName)
      Outer control logic for adding entries from a bill. Overriden in derived classes.
      Parameters:
      b - Bill object to which the new entries will be assigned.
      memberName - String of member name associated with the Bill.

    • addEntries

      public void addEntries(Bill b, String memberName, Scanner keyboard)
      Outer control logic for adding entries from a bill. Overriden in derived classes. Overloaded with Scanner object for user input.
      Parameters:
      b - Bill object to which the new entries will be assigned.
      memberName - String of member name associated with the Bill.
      keyboard - Scanner object used for user input.

    • updateEntries

      public void updateEntries(Entry e)
      Update entries in competition.
      Parameters:
      e - Entry object for updating.

    • drawWinners

      public void drawWinners()
      Control logic for drawing winners for the competition. Overriden in derived classes.

    • printWinners

      public void printWinners()
      Control logic for printing winners for the competition to the console. Overriden in derived classes.

    • printCompetitionDetails

      public void printCompetitionDetails()
      Print competition details to the console, including id, name and type.

    • printCompetitionSummary

      public void printCompetitionSummary()
      Print competition summary to the console.
